title: Add Razorpay Payment Integration for Subscriptions

requirements.text: Add Razorpay as a payment method in the backend. Store the Razorpay live key (rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg) in the backend actor configuration. Add a new backend function `createRazorpayOrder` that accepts a subscription plan type and amount, creates a Razorpay order via HTTP outcall to the Razorpay Orders API (https://api.razorpay.com/v1/orders), and returns the order ID and amount. Add a `verifyRazorpayPayment` function that accepts razorpay_order_id, razorpay_payment_id, and razorpay_signature, verifies the payment signature, records the payment transaction, and activates the user's subscription.

quotes: Add a payment option for subscriptions it is a my payment account to add a directly amount receive the money rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg add the payment

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores Razorpay live key rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg in configuration
createRazorpayOrder function accepts plan type and returns a valid Razorpay order ID
verifyRazorpayPayment function validates HMAC-SHA256 signature and activates subscription on success
Successful Razorpay payments are recorded in the payment transactions store alongside existing Stripe payments

requirements.text: Add frontend hooks for Razorpay payment flow. Create a `useRazorpayPayment` hook that calls `createRazorpayOrder` on the backend, loads the Razorpay checkout script (https://checkout.razorpay.com/v1/checkout.js) dynamically, opens the Razorpay payment modal with the order details, and on success calls `verifyRazorpayPayment` to confirm and activate the subscription. Handle payment failure and modal dismissal with appropriate error states.

quotes: Add a payment option for subscriptions

acceptanceCriteria: useRazorpayPayment hook creates a Razorpay order via backend and opens the Razorpay checkout modal
On successful payment, verifyRazorpayPayment is called and subscription is activated
Payment failure shows an error toast with a retry option
Hook is reusable from the SubscriptionPage

requirements.text: Update the SubscriptionPage (frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx) to include a Razorpay payment option alongside the existing Stripe option. Each plan card (weekly, monthly, half-yearly) should show a 'Pay with Razorpay' button that triggers the Razorpay checkout flow using the useRazorpayPayment hook. Display the amount in INR. After successful payment, redirect the user to the dashboard with a success toast.

quotes: Add a payment option for subscriptions

acceptanceCriteria: Each subscription plan card on SubscriptionPage shows a 'Pay with Razorpay' button
Clicking the button opens the Razorpay checkout modal with the correct plan amount in INR
After payment success the user is redirected to the dashboard with a subscription active toast
The existing Stripe checkout button remains functional and unmodified
Loading state is shown on the button while the Razorpay order is being created

requirements.text: Update the PaymentTransactionTable (frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentTransactionTable.tsx) to display Razorpay as a payment method option in the filter dropdown and show a Razorpay badge/indicator for transactions made via Razorpay, consistent with the existing Stripe and PhonePe method indicators.
acceptanceCriteria: PaymentTransactionTable filter dropdown includes 'Razorpay' as a filterable method
Razorpay transactions are displayed with a distinct Razorpay badge consistent with existing method badges

constraints: Use the exact Razorpay live key provided: rzp_live_SKEU5q1dCtfMpg
Do not remove or modify the existing Stripe payment integration
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
All backend logic must remain in the single main actor (backend/main.mo)
nonGoals: Replacing or removing the existing Stripe checkout flow
Adding PhonePe changes beyond what already exists
Building a Razorpay webhook receiver (verification done inline via signature check)
